name: MyBusiness
0:
”Alexa, open my business”
”Alexa, start my business”
”Alexa, launch my business”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my business
des:
This is a demo skill to provide voice presence for businesses on Alexa. 

A similar skill when developed for any business or individual, would be beneficial to drive more sales or provide customer service. 

Instructions: 
Invoke the skill by saying, Alexa, Open My Business.

You may ask any of the questions below;

1. Tell me about your business

2. Where are you located

3. I would like to talk to a sales rep

4. I would like to talk to customer service

5. What's your email address

6. How do I locate your office

7. What are your working hours

8. Do you have any vacancies

9. Are there any ongoing offers

10. What are the offers for returning customers

For custom Voice App development, contact us on contact@webcode.solutions
========================
